title: i still have a client bug.. i cant log in to league it says its not designed for window help me pls

replies.body:
I'm assuming you're currently in the process of updating from the old client, and something might be going wrong with your dll files. Try deleting the file I'm going to show in a screenshot below, but reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if this doesn't work!

https://i.gyazo.com/5d01b0cd3181d403f2ed827d45ed645b.png
